entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the students who signed a piece of parchment, and he is also present in the Great Hall with Ron and Hermione.

entities.description: Eloise Midgen is mentioned as someone who has acne, which Hermione compares to a couple of cute freckles.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are mentioned as being together in the Great Hall with Hermione, indicating a close friendship between them.
